PRAISE BE TO THE GENIUS BASTARD WHO THOUGHT OF ADDING A BLACKLIST OPTION INTO THIS SITE!! now i wont bothered browsing doujins that will interest me instead of seeing those abomination called yaoi which still doesnt add to me who even thought of making those shits? anyway this is a first and Original Series made by a mangaka who basically drawn vanilla from the very start.. well either it a wait and see basis if mr. boyfriend get the cues that something is wrong with his girlfriend or his just like the other guys of an ntr doujin who are idiots.

@jazzboy the problem is NTR is a wide genre, it varies from the guy being a dick to the girl and her end up cheating, the guy being set up to cheat the girl once and then let her know to make her end up cheating, the girl getting blackmailed for the guy's sake like in this one that doesn't even count as cheating (so far) as she's getting blackmailed/raped. I personally don't mind half of them and that's why I don't blacklist and it's pretty easy to see where things are going to ignore those I don't like.
